welcome.title: Welcome to the CHECK-FIT search portal
welcome.article1: Are you looking for a gym, a professional trainer, or a massage studio? Then you are in the right place. With CHECK-FIT you can do this in three very simple steps. Select a country, location and category.
welcome.article2: You can also advertise your company on our website.

basic.profile.title: Basic profile (Free)
basic.profile.article: Would you like to create a free profile? Click on the registration button and enter your details. The free registration includes:
basic.profile.list3: Appear by name or company name

premium.profile.title: Premium profile (€178-per/year including VAT)
premium.profile.article: Would you like to register for a premium profile? Click on the registration button and enter your details. The premium profile includes the following:

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.article: The protection of your personal data is very important to us. Therefore we process your data exclusively on the basis of the legal regulations (DSGVO, TKG 2003).

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.article: Check-fit makes reasonable efforts to provide correct and complete information on this website.

registration.page.title: Register
registration.page.passwordPlaceholder: Safe - upper and lower case and number. (8 characters)
registration.page.confirmPasswordPlaceholder: Safe - upper and lower case and number. (8 characters)

search.noMatching: There are no listings matching your search.
